*BrightBlade clicked the stasis ball shut and placed it into a compartment 
in her leg, then nodding towards Prendabot. She made a mental not to ask 
Gangon how he had been taken from his body in the first place.
She sighed as she then placed her hands behind her head and stretched her 
chest and sides, coming to walk up beside Prendabot.
Looking up at the trees as they passed she kept her hands behind her head, 
realizing that it was actually a fairly comfortable position. But then the 
thought came to her, this position showed off a bit more then just the 
curves of her sides.
She then sighed again and lowered her arms to her sides, showing off one�s 
curves was one thing, showing off the curves of those was another.
But then she began to go through a list of all the things she brought, 
making sure that she hadn�t forgotten anything.
It was obvious that she was doing no small deed, one that no Predacon of her 
unit had done before�at such a high risk. But then a bitter thought entered 
her mind, would Hell Beast even notice? Would he even care that she got very 
important info? Probably not�but she would see.*
